org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.messages

Class RequestBase.Pender

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.messages.RequestBase.Pender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageSource
    Enclosing class:
    RequestBase<RESPONSE_TYPE>

    private static final class RequestBase.Pender
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageSource
    Pender is used by the RequestBase.call method to block the current thread until a result is available and then either return the result or rethrow it if the result is an exception.
